verses.verse: וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And Samuel וַיִּקָּבְצ֤וּ <WH6908> were gathered together כָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and all the Israelites וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> and lamented ל֔וֹ וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <WH6912> him and buried בְּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> him in his house בָּרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> at Ramah וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David וַיֵּ֖רֶד <WH3381> and went down אֶל־ <WH413> to מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> to the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <WH6290> of Paran ס

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And [there was] a man בְּמָע֜וֹן <WH4584> in Maon וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <WH4639> whose possessions בַכַּרְמֶ֗ל <WH3760> [were] in Carmel וְהָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> and the man גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> great מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> [was] very וְל֛וֹ צֹ֥אן <WH6629> sheep שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <WH7969> and he had three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וְאֶ֣לֶף <WH505> and a thousand עִזִּ֑ים <WH5795> goats וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> came בִּגְזֹ֥ז <WH1494> and he was shearing אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנ֖וֹ <WH6629> his sheep בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> in Carmel

וְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> Now the name הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> of the man נָבָ֔ל <WH5037> [was] Nabal וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> of his wife אֲבִגָ֑יִל <WH26> Abigail וְהָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> and [she was] a woman טֽוֹבַת־ <WH2896> of good שֶׂ֙כֶל֙ <WH7922> understanding וִ֣יפַת <WH3303> and of a beautiful תֹּ֔אַר <WH8389> countenance וְהָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> but the man קָשֶׁ֛ה <WH7186> [was] churlish וְרַ֥ע <WH7451> and evil מַעֲלָלִ֖ים <WH4611> in his doings וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he [כָלֶבֹו כ] (כָלִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> care for ק)

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גֹזֵ֥ז <WH1494> did shear נָבָ֖ל <WH5037> that Nabal אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <WH6629> his sheep

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent out דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> ten נְעָרִ֑ים <WH5288> young men וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> and David לַנְּעָרִ֗ים <WH5288> unto the young men עֲל֤וּ <WH5927> Get you up כַרְמֶ֙לָה֙ <WH3760> to Carmel וּבָאתֶ֣ם <WH935> and go אֶל־ <WH413> about נָבָ֔ל <WH5037> to Nabal וּשְׁאֶלְתֶּם־ <WH7592> ask counsel ל֥וֹ בִשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> him in my name לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> favor

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH559> And thus shall ye say כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> and thus לֶחָ֑י <WH2416> to him that liveth וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> [in prosperity] Peace וּבֵיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> [be] to thine house שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> [be] both to thee and peace וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לְךָ֖ שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> and peace

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> And now I have heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> that גֹזְזִ֖ים <WH1494> that thou hast shearers לָ֑ךְ עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הָרֹעִ֤ים <WH7462> now thy shepherds אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לְךָ֙ הָי֣וּ <WH1961> have been עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> them לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֶכְלַמְנ֗וּם <WH3637> which were with us we hurt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נִפְקַ֤ד <WH6485> missing לָהֶם֙ מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> them not neither was there ought כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> unto them all the while הֱיוֹתָ֥ם <WH1961> have been בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> they were in Carmel

שְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> Ask אֶת־ <WH853> נְעָרֶ֜יךָ <WH5288> thy young men וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> and they will shew לָ֗ךְ וְיִמְצְא֨וּ <WH4672> find הַנְּעָרִ֥ים <WH5288> thee Wherefore let the young men חֵן֙ <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thine eyes כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and י֥וֹם <WH3117> day ט֖וֹב <WH2896> in a good בָּ֑נוּ <WH935> for we come תְּנָה־ <WH5414> give נָּ֗א <WH4994> Please אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whatever תִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> I pray thee whatsoever cometh יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> to thine hand לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants וּלְבִנְךָ֖ <WH1121> and to thy son לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came נַעֲרֵ֣י <WH5288> young men דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> And when David's וַיְדַבְּר֧וּ <WH1696> they spake אֶל־ <WH413> to נָבָ֛ל <WH5037> to Nabal כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> according to all those words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיָּנֽוּחוּ׃ <WH5117> and ceased

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered נָבָ֜ל <WH5037> And Nabal אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> servants דָוִד֙ <WH1732> David's וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> and said מִ֥י <WH4310> Who דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David's וּמִ֣י <WH4310> Who בֶן־ <WH1121> is the son יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> Jesse הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> now a days רַבּ֣וּ <WH7235> abundance עֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> servants הַמִּתְפָּ֣רְצִ֔ים <WH6555> that break away אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> his master

וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <WH3947> Shall I then take אֶת־ <WH853> לַחְמִי֙ <WH3899> my bread וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵימַ֔י <WH4325> and my water וְאֵת֙ <WH853> טִבְחָתִ֔י <WH2878> and my flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose טָבַ֖חְתִּי <WH2873> that I have killed לְגֹֽזְזָ֑י <WH1494> for my shearers וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> and give לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> to men אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whose לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> whom I know אֵ֥י <WH335> how מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

וַיַּהַפְכ֥וּ <WH2015> turned נַעֲרֵֽי־ <WH5288> young men דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> So David's לְדַרְכָּ֑ם <WH1870> their way וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> and went again וַיָּבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> and came וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <WH5046> and told ל֔וֹ כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> him all those sayings הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David לַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <WH376> every man חִגְר֣וּ ׀ <WH2296> Gird ye on אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> חַרְבּ֗וֹ <WH2719> his sword וַֽיַּחְגְּרוּ֙ <WH2296> And they girded on אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men אֶת־ <WH853> חַרְבּ֔וֹ <WH2719> his sword וַיַּחְגֹּ֥ר <WH2296> also girded on גַּם־ <WH1571> also דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> and David אֶת־ <WH853> חַרְבּ֑וֹ <WH2719> his sword וַֽיַּעֲל֣וּ ׀ <WH5927> and there went up אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> David כְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> about four מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> man וּמָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> and two hundred יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> abode עַל־ <WH5921> with הַכֵּלִֽים׃ <WH3627> by the stuff

וְלַאֲבִיגַ֙יִל֙ <WH26> Abigail אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife נָבָ֔ל <WH5037> Nabal's הִגִּ֧יד <WH5046> told נַֽעַר־ <WH5288> of the young men אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> But one מֵהַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> men לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold שָׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> Behold David מַלְאָכִ֧ים ׀ <WH4397> messengers מֵֽהַמִּדְבָּ֛ר <WH4057> out of the wilderness לְבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> to salute אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנֵ֖ינוּ <WH113> our master וַיָּ֥עַט <WH5860> and he railed בָּהֶֽם׃

וְהָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> But the men טֹבִ֥ים <WH2896> good לָ֖נוּ מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [were] very וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor הָכְלַ֙מְנוּ֙ <WH3637> unto us and we were not hurt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor פָקַ֣דְנוּ <WH6485> neither missed מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> we any thing כָּל־ <WH3605> long יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> as long as הִתְהַלַּ֣כְנוּ <WH1980> we were conversant אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> for בִּֽהְיוֹתֵ֖נוּ <WH1961> were in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> with them when we were in the fields

חוֹמָה֙ <WH2346> They were a wall הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> unto גַּם־ <WH1571> both לַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> unto us both by night גַּם־ <WH1571> both יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> and day כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֛י <WH3117> all the while הֱיוֹתֵ֥נוּ <WH1961> become עִמָּ֖ם <WH5973> them רֹעִ֥ים <WH7462> we were with them keeping הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> the sheep

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now דְּעִ֤י <WH3045> Now therefore know וּרְאִי֙ <WH7200> and consider מַֽה־ <WH4100> what תַּעֲשִׂ֔י <WH6213> what thou wilt do כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלְתָ֧ה <WH3615> is determined הָרָעָ֛ה <WH7451> for evil אֶל־ <WH413> against אֲדֹנֵ֖ינוּ <WH113> against our master וְעַ֣ל <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> and against all his household וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he בֶּן־ <WH1121> for he [is such] a son בְּלִיַּ֔עַל <WH1100> of Belial מִדַּבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> that [a man] cannot speak אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> against

וַתְּמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> made haste [אֲבֹוגַיִל כ] (אֲבִיגַ֡יִל <WH26> Abigal ק) וַתִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> and took מָאתַ֨יִם <WH3967> two hundred לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> loaves וּשְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> and two נִבְלֵי־ <WH5035> bottles יַ֗יִן <WH3196> of wine וְחָמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> and five צֹ֤אן <WH6629> sheep [עֲשָׂוֹות כ] (עֲשׂוּיֹת֙ <WH6213> accomplish ק) וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five סְאִים֙ <WH5429> measures קָלִ֔י <WH7039> of parched וּמֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> [corn] and an hundred צִמֻּקִ֖ים <WH6778> clusters of raisins וּמָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> and two hundred דְּבֵלִ֑ים <WH1690> cakes וַתָּ֖שֶׂם <WH7760> of figs and laid עַל־ <WH5921> on הַחֲמֹרִֽים׃ <WH2543> [them] on asses

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And she said לִנְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5288> unto her servants עִבְר֣וּ <WH5674> Go on לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before הִנְנִ֖י <WH2005> behold אַחֲרֵיכֶ֣ם <WH310> after בָּאָ֑ה <WH935> me behold I come וּלְאִישָׁ֥הּ <WH376> not her husband נָבָ֖ל <WH5037> Nabal לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not הִגִּֽידָה׃ <WH5046> you But she told

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> came הִ֣יא ׀ <WH1931> she רֹכֶ֣בֶת <WH7392> And it was [so as] she rode עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַחֲמ֗וֹר <WH2543> on the ass וְיֹרֶ֙דֶת֙ <WH3381> that she came down בְּסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> by the covert הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> of the hill וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold דָוִד֙ <WH1732> and behold David וַאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> and his men יֹרְדִ֖ים <WH3381> came down לִקְרָאתָ֑הּ <WH7122> toward וַתִּפְגֹּ֖שׁ <WH6298> her and she met אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> Now David אָמַ֗ר <WH559> had said אַךְ֩ <WH389> Surely לַשֶּׁ֨קֶר <WH8267> Surely in vain שָׁמַ֜רְתִּי <WH8104> have I kept אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> that לָזֶה֙ <WH2088> all that this בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> [fellow] hath in the wilderness וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not נִפְקַ֥ד <WH6485> was missed מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֖וֹ מְא֑וּמָה <WH3972> so that nothing וַיָּֽשֶׁב־ <WH7725> of all that [pertained] unto him and he hath requited לִ֥י רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> me evil תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> for good

כֹּה־ <WH3541> So יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <WH6213> also do אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God לְאֹיְבֵ֥י <WH341> unto the enemies דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> also יֹסִ֑יף <WH3254> and more אִם־ <WH518> if אַשְׁאִ֧יר <WH7604> if I leave מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of any אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ל֛וֹ עַד־ <WH5704> of all that [pertain] to him by הַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> the morning מַשְׁתִּ֥ין <WH8366> any that pisseth בְּקִֽיר׃ <WH7023> against the wall
